title: I feel like this should be easy
content:
Hello Typophiles,

I'm two semesters into Graphic Design and this is my first time posting. I'm pretty excited about it. I feel like identifying this type should be easy and I may have found it but I'd like to be 100% sure. Any help would be appreciated.

Best,  
Daniel

comments.content: That looks pretty dam perfect. Thank you!
